biotools.summary:
A graph-based residue neighborhood strategy to predict binding sites.

The discovery of protein-ligand-binding sites is a major step for elucidating protein function and for investigating new functional roles. Detecting protein-ligand-binding sites experimentally is time-consuming and expensive.

bioschemas.name: GRaSP-py
